text: According to ''The Hollywood Reporter'' , Director of ''The Hunger Games'' , Gary Ross is currently in the negotiation stages to direct the sequel to ''The Hunger Games'' . In terms of figures, ''The Hunger Games'' has already brought in over $363 million. Apparently, ''Lionsgate'' would like a a November 2013 release date for ''The Hunger Games'' sequel. The main cast ; - Jennifer Lawrence - Liam Hemsworth - and Josh Hutcherson will all be returning for the sequel!
title: 'The Hunger Games' sequel is in negotiations.
